include_fbjssdk.label: Include Facebook JavaScript SDK
include_fbjssdk.comment: Whether or not to include Facebook JavaScript SDK. (This is needed for Facebook plugin to function, however if you already included it manually or via some other magento extension there is no need to include it twice.) Default is "Yes".

include_platformjs.label: Include Google platform.js
include_platformjs.comment: Whether or not to include Google platform.js file. (This is needed for google plugin to function, however if you already included it manually or via some other magento extension there is no need to include it twice.) Default is "Yes".

include_injs.label: Include Linkedin in.js
include_injs.comment: Whether or not to include in.js file. (This is needed for Linkedin plugin to function, however if you already included it manually or via some other magento extension there is no need to include it twice.) Default is "Yes".

include_pinitjs.label: Include Pinterest pinit.js
include_pinitjs.comment: Whether or not to include pinit.js file. (This is needed for Pinterest plugin to function, however if you already included it manually or via some other magento extension there is no need to include it twice.) Default is "Yes".

include_widgetsjs.label: Include Twitter widgets.js
include_widgetsjs.comment: Whether or not to include Twitter widgets.js file. (This is needed for Twitter plugin to function, however if you already included it manually or via some other magento extension there is no need to include it twice.) Default is "Yes".

addthis_id.label: AddThis Profile ID (pubid)
addthis_id.comment: The AddThis Profile ID. AddThis service will not function properly without Profile ID.

addthis_sidebar_enabled.label: AddThis Sidebar Enabled
addthis_sidebar_enabled.comment: Enables AddThis Sharing Sidebar. You still need to activate it in your AddThis dashboard.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enables or disables Open Graph markup.

pages.label: Add Open Graph To
pages.comment: Pages where Open Graph will be added. You can select multiple options.

facebook_admins.label: Facebook Administrator IDs (fb:admins)
facebook_admins.comment: Facebook IDs of the app's administrators as comma separated list. Example: 4,42

facebook_app_id.label: Facebook App Id (fb:app_id)
facebook_app_id.comment: The ID of your Facebook app. If you do not have one leave empty.

facebook_profile_id.label: Facebook Profile ID (article:author)
facebook_profile_id.comment: Facebook profile ID for article:author meta tag.

category_image.label: Category Image (og:image)
category_image.comment: Image for category pages og:image meta tag.

enabled.label: Enabled
enabled.comment: Enables or disables Pinterest Rich Pins.
enabled.tooltip: Pinterest Rich Pins are using Open Graph meta tags to implement their functionality, therefore Open Graph must be enabled in order for Pinterest Rich Pins to function.

pages.label: Add Google+ Markup To
pages.comment: Pages where Google+ Markup will be added. You can select multiple options.

author_url.label: Author Google+ Url
author_url.comment:
Url to author's Google+ page. Example:
https://plus.google.com/[Google+_Profile_ID]/posts
author_url.tooltip:
This url will be added to the <head> tag like this:
<link rel="author" href="https://plus.google.com/[Google+_Profile]/posts"/>
If you do not want this tag, leave this field empty.

publisher_url.label: Publisher Google+ Url
publisher_url.comment:
Url to publisher's Google+ page. Example:
https://plus.google.com/[Google+_Page_Profile]
publisher_url.tooltip:
This url will be added to the <head> tag like this:
<link rel="publisher" href="https://plus.google.com/[Google+_Page_Profile]"/>
If you do not want this tag, leave this field empty.

meta_tags_enabled.label: Schema.org Meta Tags Enabled
meta_tags_enabled.comment: Enables or disables Schema.org meta tags. These are just basic meta tags. Schema.org markup is highly dependent on Magento theme and extensions used on your site, therefore cannot be done properly via extension. For full Schema.org markup check out our Schema.org Microdata for Magento service.

category_image.label: Category Image (itemprop="image")
category_image.comment: Image for category pages itemprop="image" meta tag.

pages.label: Add Twitter Cards To
pages.comment: Pages where Twitter Cards will be added. You can select multiple options.

creator_username.label: Creator's Username (twitter:creator)
creator_username.comment: Content creator's Twitter username. You can use the site username or leave empty.

domain.label: Domain Name (twitter:domain)
domain.comment: Domain name in format YourDomain.com for better readability. You can leave it empty and then all lowercase version will be used.

secondary_data.label: Secondary Data (twitter:data2)
secondary_data.comment: Secondary data for product Twitter cards.

mobile_apps_enabled.label: Mobile App Integration
mobile_apps_enabled.comment: Enables or disables Mobile App Integration.

app_id_googleplay.label: Android (twitter:app:id:googleplay)
app_id_googleplay.comment: The ID of your Android app in the Google Play App Store. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_name_googleplay.label: Android (twitter:app:name:googleplay)
app_name_googleplay.comment: The name of your Android app. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_url_googleplay.label: Android (twitter:app:url:googleplay)
app_url_googleplay.comment: The URL to open your Android app and take the user to the respective page that the card URL represents. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_id_ipad.label: iPad (twitter:app:id:ipad)
app_id_ipad.comment: The ID of your iPad app in the iTunes App Store. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_name_ipad.label: iPad (twitter:app:name:ipad)
app_name_ipad.comment: The name of your iPad app. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_url_ipad.label: iPad (twitter:app:url:ipad)
app_url_ipad.comment: The URL to open your iPad app and take the user to the respective page that the card URL represents. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_id_iphone.label: iPhone (twitter:app:id:iphone)
app_id_iphone.comment: The ID of your iPhone app in the iTunes App Store. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_name_iphone.label: iPhone (twitter:app:name:iphone)
app_name_iphone.comment: The name of your iPhone app. If you do not have one leave empty.

app_url_iphone.label: iPhone (twitter:app:url:iphone)
app_url_iphone.comment: The URL to open your iPhone app and take the user to the respective page that the card URL represents. If you do not have one leave empty.

enabled.comment: Enables or disables product page buttons.

layout.comment: The way buttons are presented. Can be either "horizontal" or "vertical".

parent.comment: Parent block where product social buttons will reside. There are several options to choose from.

position.label: Position
position.comment: Position inside parent block. Can be either "Bottom (after)" or "Top (before)".

addthis_enabled.comment: Enables or disables AddThis social bookmarking service.

addthis_custom.label: AddThis Custom Image Buttons
addthis_custom.comment: Enables or disables AddThis custom image buttons.

addthis_show_both.label: Show Both AddThis and Original Buttons
addthis_show_both.comment: If you want to have both AddThis and original social buttons choose "Yes".

facebook_data_action.label: Action (data-action)
facebook_data_action.comment: The verb to display on the button. Can be either "like" or "recommend". Default is "like".

facebook_data_colorscheme.label: Color Scheme (data-colorscheme)
facebook_data_colorscheme.comment: The color scheme used by the plugin. Can be "light" or "dark". Default is "light".

facebook_data_kid_directed_site.label: Kid Directed Site (data-kid-directed-site)
facebook_data_kid_directed_site.comment: If your web site or online service, or a portion of your service, is directed to children under 13 you must enable this. Default is "false".

facebook_data_layout.label: Layout (data-layout)
facebook_data_layout.comment: Selects one of the different layouts that are available for the plugin. Can be one of "standard", "button_count", "button", or "box_count". See the FAQ for more details. Default is "standard".

facebook_data_share.label: Share Button (data-share)
facebook_data_share.comment: Specifies whether to include a share button beside the Like button. Default is "true".

facebook_data_show_faces.label: Show Faces (data-show-faces)
facebook_data_show_faces.comment: Specifies whether to display profile photos below the button (standard layout only). You must not enable this on child-directed sites. Default is "false".

facebook_data_width.label: Width (data-width)
facebook_data_width.comment: The width of the plugin. The layout you choose affects the minimum and default widths you can use, please see the FAQ for more details.

google_data_size.label: Size (data-size)
google_data_size.comment: Sets the +1 button size to render. See button sizes for more information. Default is "standard".

google_data_annotation.label: Size (data-annotation)
google_data_annotation.comment: Sets the annotation to display next to the button. Default is "bubble".

google_data_width.label: Width (data-width)
google_data_width.comment: If data-annotation is set to "inline", this parameter sets the width in pixels to use for the button and its inline annotation. If the width is omitted, a button and its inline annotation use 450px. See Inline annotation widths for examples of how the annotation is displayed for various width settings.

google_data_align.label: Align (data-align)
google_data_align.comment: Sets the horizontal alignment of the button assets within its frame. Default is "left".

google_data_recommendations.label: Recommendations (data-recommendations)
google_data_recommendations.comment: To disable showing recommendations within the +1 hover bubble, set data-recommendations to false. Default is "true".

linkedin_data_counter.label: Counter (data-counter)
linkedin_data_counter.comment: Whether or not to show the the share count and where it gets displayed. Defaults to not showing if this attribute is not present. Valid options are "right" and "top".

linkedin_data_showzero.label: Show Zero (data-showzero)
linkedin_data_showzero.comment: Whether to show a zero or a placeholder in the counter if there are no shares. Shows a 0 digit if counter="right". Shows a LinkedIn Icon if counter="top".

pinterest_hover_button.label: Pinterest Hover Button
pinterest_hover_button.comment: Pinterest hover button. Valid options are "do not show", "only on product pages", and "global". Default is "only on product pages".

pinterest_size.label: Pin Size
pinterest_size.comment: Size of the pin button. Valid options are "small" and "large". Default is "small".

pinterest_data_pin_shape.label: Pin Shape (data-pin-shape)
pinterest_data_pin_shape.comment: Shape of the pin button. Valid options are "circular" and "rectangular". Default is "rectangular".

pinterest_data_pin_color.label: Pin Color (data-pin-color)
pinterest_data_pin_color.comment: Color of the pin button. Valid options are "gray", "red", and "white". Default is "gray".

pinterest_data_pin_config.label: Pin Count (data-pin-config)
pinterest_data_pin_config.comment: Whether or not to show the pin count and where it gets displayed. Valid options are "above", "beside", and "none".

twitter_data_count.comment: Whether or not to show the the share count and where it gets displayed. Default is "horizontal".

twitter_data_size.label: Size (data-size)
twitter_data_size.comment: Size of the button, can be "medium" or "large". Default is "medium".
